mapper.select: select ani.ANIMAL_NAME ANIMAL_NAME, ani.ANIMAL_BREED ANIMAL_BREED, pers.PER_NAME PER_NAME, jry.JRYO_NUM JRYO_NUM, jry.JRYO_DISEASES JRYO_DISEASES, jry.SYMPTOM SYMPTOM, jry.JRYO_DT JRYO_DT, cus.CUS_NAME CUS_NAME, ani.ANIMAL_NUM ANIMAL_NUM from ANIMAL ani, JINRYO jry, PERSON pers, CUSTOMER cus where ani.ANIMAL_NUM = #{animalNum} and jry.PER_ID = pers.PER_ID and jry.ANIMAL_NUM = ani.ANIMAL_NUM and ani.CUS_TEL = cus.CUS_TEL
select DISTINCT PA_MID from PAPER where PA_BIG=#{bigMenus.getI}
select PA_NUM, PA_SM, PA_SELECT_NUM from PAPER where PA_BIG=#{bigMenu} and PA_MID=#{midMenu}
select TX_NUM, TX_SMALL, TX_PRICE from TX where TX_LARGE=#{txLargeMenu}

select distinct(s.stock_name) stock_name, g.MEDI_COMPONENTKOR MEDI_COMPONENTKOR, g.MEDI_COMPONENTENG MEDI_COMPONENTENG, s.STOCK_COUNT STOCK_COUNT, g.goods_price_out goods_price_out from stock s, goods g where (s.stock_name=g.stock_name and not s.stock_count=0) and g.goods_use='동물용의약품'
select * from DISEASE where DI_NAME like '%${value}%'
mapper.insert: insert into jinryo values( SEQ_JINRYO.nextval, #{per_id}, #{jryo_diseases}, #{symptom}, sysdate, #{jryo_memo}, #{animal_num}, #{jryo_price}, #{jryo_tx}, #{jryo_rx} )

SELECT SEQ_JINRYO.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO vital VALUES( SEQ_JINRYO_VITAL.nextval, #{jryo_num}, #{vt_weight}, #{vt_temperature}, #{vt_systolic_blood}, #{vt_diastolic_blood}, #{vt_heart_rate}, #{vt_breathing_rate} )

SELECT SEQ_JINRYO.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PAPER_HISTORY VALUES( SEQ_PAPER_HISTORY.nextval, #{num}, #{jryo_num}, #{value} )

SELECT SEQ_JINRYO.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO jinryo_image VALUES( SEQ_JINRYO_IMG.nextval, #{jryo_num}, #{name}, #{fakeName} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.per_name, a.animal_name, c.jryo_num, c.jryo_diseases, c.symptom, c.jryo_dt, c.jryo_tx, c.jryo_rx FROM jinryo c, person p, animal a WHERE jryo_num = #{jryo_num} AND a.animal_num = c.animal_num AND p.per_id = c.per_id
SELECT p.pa_sm, h.pa_h_history FROM paper_history h, paper p WHERE jryo_num = #{jryo_num} AND p.pa_num = h.pa_num
select TX_NUM,TX_LARGE,TX_SMALL,TX_PRICE from TX where TX_NUM=#{txNum}
select * from RESERVATION where PER_ID=#{per_id} and to_char(COUNTER_DATE_TIME,'yyyymmdd')=to_char(#{today}) and COUNTER_STATE='o' and JINRYO_STATE='x'
